common.name: Moniker
common.title: Headline
common.fileTooLarge: Too heavy for the ship! Max be {maxSizeMB}MB. Yer loot be {fileSizeMB}MB.
common.uploadFailedRetry: Hoist failed. Give it another go.
common.dropImageOrClick: Drop painting or click to hoist
common.categoryWillBeCreatedIn: New chart will be stored in:
common.selectCategoryForClone: Where be we movin' this loot?
common.unsavedChangesMessage: Ye have loose cargo in {noteTitle}. If ye sail now, it'll be lost at sea.
common.whatToDoWithUnsavedChanges: What'll ye do with the loot?
common.confirmDeleteItem: Ye sure ye want to scuttle "{itemTitle}"?

history.restoreConfirm: Go back in time? The current scribbles will be lost.
history.noHistoryDescription: Stow yer log to make a mark in history.
history.disabledAdmin: The Captain has disabled the history logs.
history.disabledUser: History is disabled. Beg the Captain to turn it on.
history.manualSavesOnly: History is only marked when ye stow manually, not by magic.
history.fetchError: Could not find the old tales
history.restoreError: Could not bring back the dead

auth.errorOccurred: Blimey! A storm's brewin'. Try again.
auth.createAdminAccountDescription: Create yer Captain's account to take the helm
auth.attemptsRemaining: Warning: {count} tries left before we throw ye in the brig
auth.accountLocked: To the brig with ye! Wait {seconds} seconds.
auth.notAuthorized: Ye lack the clearance! Talk to the Captain.

mfa.title: Two-Step Verification
mfa.setupDescription: Spy the Rune below with yer magic box
mfa.verifySetup: Enter the 6-digit mark to prove it
mfa.recoveryCodeInfo: Keep this safe in yer boot. If ye lose yer magic box, this gets ye back in.
mfa.verifyDescription: Enter the mark from yer magic box
mfa.tooManyAttempts: Ye tried too many times. Walk the plank!
mfa.disableDescription: Enter yer code to break the pact
mfa.disableWarning: This leaves yer treasure unguarded. Ye sure?
mfa.setupCompleteDescription: The Secret Handshake is set. Guard yer Skeleton Key with yer life!
mfa.regenerateRecoveryCodeWarning: This will melt down yer old key
mfa.regenerateRecoveryCodeDescription: Enter yer mark to forge a new key. The old one be useless scrap.
mfa.recoveryCodeRegeneratedInfo: Here be yer new key. Hide it well!
mfa.recoveryCodeProfileDescription: Use this if yer magic box falls overboard

notes.title: Logs
notes.createFirstNote: Scribe yer first log to begin yer legend.
notes.noNotesFound: No logs found in the chest
notes.tryAdjustingFilters: Clean yer spyglass or forge a new log.

checklists.title: Manifests
checklists.createFirstChecklist: Forge yer first manifest to keep the crew in line.
checklists.tryAdjustingFiltersChecklist: Clean yer spyglass or forge a new manifest.
checklists.checkAllConfirmMessage: Ye sure ye want to mark {count} items as done?
checklists.uncheckAllConfirmMessage: Ye sure ye want to unmark {count} items?
checklists.clearAllCompletedConfirmMessage: Ye sure ye want to scuttle {count} finished items? Gone forever!
checklists.clearAllIncompleteConfirmMessage: Ye sure ye want to scuttle {count} unfinished items? Gone forever!
checklists.convertTypeConfirmation: Ye be changin' from {currentType} to {newType}. Aye?
checklists.dataLossWarningItems: The following loot will be lost:
checklists.youHaveItemsThatWillNotBeAdded: Ye have {count} items left on the dock. Sail without 'em?

tasks.title: Chores
tasks.tryAdjustingFiltersTaskList: Clean spyglass or forge new roster.

profile.apiKeyDescription: Forge a key for the robots
profile.usernameUpdateWarning: Changin' yer name means ye walk the plank and swim back aboard.
profile.failedToRebuildIndex: Could not retie knots. Try again.
profile.startCreatingInternalLinks: Start throwing lines to connect yer logs.

settings.title: Rigging
settings.customTranslationsInfo: Want to speak yer own dialect?
settings.chooseAutoSaveInterval: How often the ship stows itself.
settings.chooseNotesDefaultMode: Ready to write or ready to read.
settings.minimalModeDescription: Just the text, no fancy bits.
settings.chooseDefaultNoteFilter: What ye see first in the logs.
settings.chooseDefaultChecklistFilter: What ye see first in the manifests.
settings.deleteAccountDescription: Burn yer papers and walk the plank.
settings.quickCreateNotesDescription: Skip the chatter and start writin'.

admin.title: Captain
admin.deleteUserConfirmation: Ye sure ye want to make "{username}" walk the plank?
admin.parseContentPerformanceWarning: "Nay" makes the ship faster but harder to read.
admin.disableHistoryWarning: Burns all the old tales. Cannot be undone.
admin.adminContentAccessDescription: Can the Captain open everyone's chest?
admin.allChecklistsAndNotesDescription: Exports everything in a big chest (zip).
admin.userChecklistsNotesDescription: Pick a mate to export their chest.
admin.wholeDataFolderDescription: Exports the entire 'data' hold. Heavy lifting.
admin.maxLogAgeDaysDescription: How long to keep the black book.

pwa.installPromptMessage: Anchor this app on yer device

encryption.privateKeyWarning: WARNING: Yer key unlocks everything. Don't lose it.
encryption.promptForPassphraseDescription: Ask for code every time ye open a buried log.
encryption.deleteKeysConfirmMessage: This melts yer keys. Ye won't open yer treasure again!
encryption.noteWillBeEncryptedBeforeSaving: Log will be buried then stowed
encryption.noteWillBeDecryptedForViewing: Dug up for yer eyes only
encryption.onlySomeoneWithPassphraseCanDecrypt: Only the code holder can dig it up
encryption.generateOrImportKeysInProfile: Go to Yer Mug -> Davy Jones' Locker
encryption.onlySomeoneWithPrivateKeyCanDecrypt: Only the key holder can dig it up
encryption.rememberPassphraseCannotRecover: Remember the code! We can't help ye if ye forget.

settingsModal.sessionOnlyPrefix: These rules only last 'til ye leave port. For permanent rules check

migration.adminAccessDescription: Only the Captain can do this.
migration.sharingDataMigrationDescription: We need to move the cargo around.

auditLogs.title: The Black Book
auditLogs.confirmCleanup: Rip out pages older than {days} days? Gone forever.
auditLogs.confirmCleanupUnlimited: We keep everything forever unless ye tear it out.

notFound.title: Chart Leads Nowhere
notFound.imNoPoet: I ain't no bard, just a pirate.
